change_how_your_public_dashboard_looks_a: change how your public dashboard looks and feels.
change_the_user_interface_colors_to_matc: change the user interface colors to match your preferences or usage environment.
comfortable_for_the_eyes_in_low_light: Comfortable for the eyes in low light.
the_default_language_for_displaying_the_: The default language for displaying the main dashboard.
specify_whether_you_want_to_display_the_: Specify whether you want to display the time in 12-hour or 24-hour format.
enable_or_disable_animations_in_the_inte: Enable or disable animations in the interface to improve performance.
oops_the_page_youre_looking_for_doesnt_e: Oops! The page youâ€™re looking for doesnâ€™t exist. It might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable. Please check the URL or go back to the homepage.
click_to_publish_exam_grades_for_all_stu: Click to publish exam grades for all students. You can review and edit grades before final publication.
this_table_shows_the_current_grades_for_: This table shows the current grades for all students. You can modify the grades or add new ones for each exam.
subject: Subject
login_description: Nahrain Central is an academic platform for professors and students to manage grades, schedules, and attendance. It centralizes academic tasks in one place to streamline the educational process.
finish_signup_description: Thank you for registering! Please wait for the head of the department to add your account to the system. You will be notified once your account is activated. The head of the department can add accounts for individuals who have registered or have not yet created an account.
finish_signup_title: The account has been successfully created!
professors_can_publish_student_grades: Professors can publish student grades on Nahrain Central, allowing students to easily view their results and track their academic progress through the platform.
enter_verification_code_displayed_in_goo: Enter the verification code displayed in the Google Authenticator app or TOTP app, then proceed.
enter_the_6_digit_security_code_from_you: Enter the 6-digit security code from your authenticator app.
single_video_description: Share the full video link to the lectures directly.
playlist_description: Share the playlist link and it will be added to the lectures directly.
instructions: You can choose to add a single video or a playlist from YouTube. If you choose a video, it will be listed in a playlist associated with a specific course and lecture (theoretical or practical). If you choose a playlist, it will be added as is, specifying the course and lecture type.
success_description: The video has been successfully added to the playlist associated with the course and the specified lecture.
attendance_description: Each time a new attendance is taken, new data is fetched for students. If there is no internet connection, the latest data will not be available.
invalid_email: Invalid email. Please use an email from nahrainuniv.edu.iq or nahrainuniv.
invalid_full_name: Please enter your full name in Arabic, consisting of exactly 3 parts.
invalid_password: Please make sure the confirm password matches the password.
please_fill_totp: Please fill all the TOTP boxes.
totp_failed: TOTP verification failed. Please try again.
login_failed: Login failed. Incorrect email or password. Please check your credentials.
account_created_successfully: The account has been successfully created!
account_created_successfully_description: Thank you for registering! Please wait for the department head to add your account to the system. You will be notified once your account is activated. The department head can add accounts for people who have registered or have not yet created an account.
users_screen_description: View and manage all professors and students. Add new users, update their details, and ensure accurate records.
professors_description: Professors can teach multiple stages,record attendance, publish grades, schedule exams, and share educational resources.
students_description: Students can view their schedules, track attendance, check grades, access course materials, and stay updated on upcoming exams.
admin_description: Admins can create users, assign semester grades, create syllabuses, view charts and analyses, and manage the academic platform.
name: Name
schedule_description: Create, manage, and review schedules. Edit or delete drafts, while approved schedules are locked. Duplicate approved schedules to make changes.
create_new_schedule_description: Create a new schedule and view key statistics, including professors' weekly hours and fixed lab times.
syllabus_description: The Syllabus Management Screen provides an overview of all course materials, allowing admins to filter, search, and manage them efficiently. Users can quickly add, edit, or delete materials, assign professors, and track lab requirements.
no_current_data: No data available yet. Please check back later.
select_admin_description: Manages the platform, approves schedules, oversees user roles, and ensures smooth operation.
select_prof_description: Teaches assigned courses, tracks student attendance, and inputs grades.
select_student_description: Views schedules, tracks attendance, and monitors academic performance.
new_user_created_successfully: The user account has been successfully created and is now ready for use.
